import React from 'react'; import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles'; import { Container, Grid, Card, CardContent, CardMedia, Typography, Button, } from '@material-ui/core'; const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ container: { height: '100vh', backgroundColor: '#9de2ff', }, card: { borderRadius: '15px', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', height: '230px', width: '455px', }, cardImage: { width: '180px', borderRadius: '10px', }, cardContent: { flexGrow: 1, marginLeft: theme.spacing(3), }, buttonGroup: { paddingTop: theme.spacing(1), display: 'flex', }, button: { flexGrow: 1, marginRight: theme.spacing(1), }, })); export default function Basic() { const classes = useStyles(); return ( Danny McLoan Senior Journalist
